author: Fidelis Mbah
title: Nigeria announces lockdown of major cities to curb coronavirus
description: The 14-day lockdown will be enforced in the commercial hub, Lagos, neighbouring Ogun and the nation's capital, Abuja.
content:
Nigeria has announced a sweeping quarantine for three major states that are home to almost 30 million people, in a bid to slow the spread of the new coronavirus in Africa's most populous country.
The lockdown in Lagos, Abuja and Ogun will kick in at 11pm loc… [+4991 chars]
